entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sackville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 12 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2 except plus 1 along the Fundy coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2 except plus 1 along the Fundy coast. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2 except near plus 1 along the Fundy coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2 except near plus 1 along the Fundy coast. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
